question: Write at least 150 words. You have seen a job advertised in the newspaper. text: I am writing this letter regarding an advertisement published in the Gandhi newspaper , I would like apply for the position of senior product analyst which is mentioned in the advert.

Firstly , I have completed my bachelor's degree in information technology from the renowned institute "RKDF University" , where I was selected for campus placement and joined my recent company as a assistant trainee. I have also then persuaded my masters in the same stream taking 2 years of  leave without pay .

Additionally, I have done a few certifications in Agile such as PSM1  and PSPO1.

error_list.error_des: It appears that the verb apply should be in the to-infinitive form. Consider adding the word to.
The article a may be incorrect. Consider changing it to agree with the beginning sound of the following word assistant.
If you do not want circulam to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
If you do not want vitee to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
